Articles.Content: 446: Jeb's coffee is banned by the Kerbal States. Meanwhile, Jeb hops on a leaky oil barrel with a smoke pipe on the bottom and flies 1,000........nanometers into the air.
446,000001 First manned rocket launch failure.
446,000005 First unmanned rocket launch when a piece of metal flew into the air.

Year 476: The first "liquid-rocket" is discovered when a kerbal put the flammable liquid in a SRB and ignited it.

Edited January 16, 2014 by KittyProgram
Year 477: Nothing happens. I mean it, literally nothing happens.
Year 478: Somehow, the timeflow device unblocked, and kerbal went back to life...

Year 476: The first "liquid-rocket" is discovered when a kerbal put the flammable liquid in a SRB and ignited it.

There was a history like this.. please read the entire history then posy.

Year 478: Apparently, If you put wooden boards between rocket parts,connect them with Kerbal Tape, and place small (read: large) explosives in between the boards, it separates the two rocket parts.

Thus, the stack separator was invented. A month later, they figured out that taping the stack separator to the bottom rocket keeps it from flying everywhere.

The two-stage rocket and stack decouplers are born.

Year 480: The Kerbals FINALLY build KSC. After it is constructed, Jeb, Bill, and Bob build and launch Kerbin's first suborbital space probe. The Kerbal Space Program begins. Also, the kerbal 80s begins.
Year 485: Various Deep Space Krakens spontaneously appear on Kerbin and make the kerbals impromptuously reach a new technology level.
486: First manned rocket suborbital. And also first SAS is born.

500 : The hangar where were kept all the rocket parts suddenly explodes. The explosion is as huge as is the stock of this then-flowering new space industry. Thousands of kerbals are killed, and Wherner Von Kerman's scientific archives are destroyed.

(wait, it was 486, they had SAS, decouplers, everything we don't have in 5000 when starting a campaign ?)
503: Time machine invented. Kerbals are now able to timewarp forward, but not back.

500 : The hangar where were kept all the rocket parts suddenly explodes. The explosion is as huge as is the stock of this then-flowering new space industry. Thousands of kerbals are killed, and Wherner Von Kerman's scientific archives are destroyed.

(wait, it was 486, they had SAS, decouplers, everything we don't have in 5000 when starting a campaign ?)

I think that's because they had it but at 4000 the entire Kerbal nation with warp machines has been wiped out, and only few kerbals live and they start a new civilization, but anywys:

513: Kerbal history scientists find few not-burned pages from werner's theories, they build a rocket again and get a satelite to orbit, but not to go back.
514: Atmospheric decay causes the satellite to crash in a remote area of Kuba; international fingers of blame are pointed everywhere.
515: Scientists have found that pointing your rocket retrograde before burning is a good way of deorbiting
516: scientists have developed an autopilot, in a stroke of brilliance they decide to call it MechJeb after jebediah kerman the best test pilot.
520: First manned flyby of Mun.
530: The wing is discovered when when Matt Kerman dropped a sheet of metal from the VAB in hope of creating a magic carpet.
531: Kerbals are now trying to fly around in one-winged vehicles. They're sad that they didn't invent the airbag first.
532: Kerbals discover the importance of having two wings. Also Minmus is added to the list of moons after an engineer tried to 'catch the flying mint' and failed miserably.
540: First manned orbital of mun, and first unmanned flyby of minmus.
542: The Kerbals start to develop crude RCS systems.
543: Kerbals find out that looking closely into the inside of RCS when it's firing is bad for eyes.
549: Breaking news! Scientists have put some RCS thrusters and fuel on a rocket, and they could steer it! (at least a few seconds, before it exploded)
